facts: Apple internal components observed: duetexpertd, triald, JetsamEvent, Backboardd, Suggestions.
No strong cross-device time correlations found.
hypotheses: CoreDuet/UI over-activity may indicate heightened behavioral collection; not proof of compromise.
Potential state-level misuse of Microsoft infrastructure is suggestive, not conclusive.
Kabuki (Pegasus-evolved) may coordinate multi-device observation; insufficient evidence for confirmation.
